query:
SELECT 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM invoices WHERE userId = 1) as invoice_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM clients WHERE userId = 1) as client_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM expenses WHERE userId = 1) as expense_count,
  (SELECT invoicesCreated FROM usageTracking WHERE userId = 1 AND month = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-01')) as current_usage;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user REX6DRAh92xmf1o.58be8e717db2 --database coKdAkLfsbebvczbYNFn3V --execute SELECT 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM invoices WHERE userId = 1) as invoice_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM clients WHERE userId = 1) as client_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM expenses WHERE userId = 1) as expense_count,
  (SELECT invoicesCreated FROM usageTracking WHERE userId = 1 AND month = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-01')) as current_usage;
